title: Is Problems Plus in Mathematics by A. Das Gupta or Vikas Gupta’s book Advanced Problems in Mathematics better for the JEE Advanced 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well i haven’t done A.Das Gupta and neither of my friends did it. So i cannot tell you about that. I will only tell you about Balaji’s Advanced problems in Mathematics by Vikas Gupta. According to me, it is the best book for JEE advanced preparations.See tough questions can be of types. But a specific kind of difficult questions come in advanced, not just anything randomly is asked. So this book has chosen the best kinds of questions to preactise whichclear conceptswidens your approachlets you think in the correct wayAlso, it have questions on aall the patterns, so noting is left.We often start a book very energetically but then we are unable to complete it. If you complete this book nicely, have all the doubts solved, no one can stop you to crack JEE advanced. All the very best !
